img_text: WorldStar Today SUBSCRIBE HERE! Vector 90 Siriu YOUTUBE/SIRIUSXM Nip partnered with a real estate developer to open up Vector 90 a shared inner city co-work space for local entreprenuers. On the second level they have an area for young kids that focuses on STEM education. They equip the young kids in the community with the tools and opportunity to learn a skill set that would get them into Silicon Valley
